hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Umar said:“Utbah bin Ghazwan delivered a sermon on the pulpit and said: ‘I saw myself the seventh of seven with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and we did not have any food to eat except the leaves of trees, until our gums hurt.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَعِيشَةِ أَصْحَابِ النَّبِيِّ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The livelihood of the companions of the Prophet (ﷺ)
